title: Mobile Munchies - Food Truck
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Long-time running food truck, on the main (Monroe Park) campus of Virginia Commonwealth University. Offers smoothies, juices, and a few veg choices. Open hours are subject to the weather, so check ahead.
streetAddress: W Main St and Linden St
